Identification.ShortTitle: Social Insurance Number Replacement Card Fees Order, 1988
Identification.LongTitle: Order Prescribing the Fee or Charge To Be Paid by the Holder of a Social Insurance Number Card for the Replacement of that Card

Provision.Text: The Minister of Employment and Immigration, pursuant to Order in Council P.C. 1988-1734 of August 25, 1988*, herey revokes the Social Insurance Number Replacement Card Fee or Charge Order, made on June 27, 1985**, and makes the annexed Order prescribing the fee or charge to be paid by the holder of a Social Insurance Number Card for the replacement of that Card, in substitution therefor.

Footnote.Text: SI/88-130, 1988 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 3883
SI/85-124, 1985 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 3082

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Social Insurance Number Replacement Card Fees Order, 1988.
The fee or charge to be paid by the holder of a Social Insurance Number Card for the replacement of that Card is $10 per Card, except where the replacement is made as a result of

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a legal change in the name of the holder;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an error made by an official of the Government of Canada in the exercise of the official’s duties; or
